name: Tether (itch) (Suitangi, pizheyu0621, cdm, jmt5997)
description:
Move the mouse to control the Circle.

The Square is tethered to the Circle.

To score points, destroy the blue Triangles with the blue side of the tether, and destroy Orange Triangles with the orange side of the tether. Scoring points in quick succession will fill up your combo meter. Once filled up, it will activate slow mode for 10 seconds where all Triangles become slower.

Triangles that hit the wrong side of the tether will break it. 

Triangles that hit you will cause you to lose a point and become untethered.

Make contact with the Square to re-tether yourself to it.

If you lose the square (it goes off the screen while untethered), the game is over.

Hit to restart the game.

(Hint: Hold  to pull on the tether)
